column4: Hi..looking for help trying to install Graphic Driver...ubuntu 11.10  Intel Corporation Mobile GM965/GL960  Sony Vaio VGN NR220E
where i can find the right channel.. for graphic drivers support??????????????
the additional drivers doesnt recognizes any graphical dirver!!!
that is not the output of what I gave you... but regardless, what version of ubuntu are you on?
11.10  output: 00:02.0 VGA compatible controller [0300]: Intel Corporation Mobile GM965/GL960 Integrated Graphics Controller (primary) [8086:2a02] (rev 0c)
bash: !info: event not found...... ok installing driver
sorry that was just for the bot, wasnt sure in 11.10 if it was i965-va-driver or libva-driver-i965
so what i do ??? should i cont. with the driver installation?
just installed the i965-va-driver! not the livba driver .. its that ok???
yes... there is only one... it was renamed. I was just trying to get the bot to tell me which name it was in oneiric
ok so that is the best graphic driver for my card... should i restart the sys??
yes... I would expect you to have no problems going forward with video/etc
ok thank you i really appreciate your support and time...
